briefTitle: A 12-week Human Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Polycan on Bone Metabolism

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* They were required to have reduced bone density but no evidence of osteoporosis or osteopenia by Dual-emission X-ray absorptiometry (DEXA) scan (T â‰¥ -1.0 in the lumbar spine).
* Perimenopausal women : aged 40-70

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women with a body mass index (BMI) \>30 kg/m2 or who were being treated with estrogens, corticosteroids, or bisphosphonates, or who had significant illness affecting bone metabolism were excluded

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in DPD(Deoxypyridinoline)
outcomeMeasures.description: DPD(Deoxypyridinoline) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in OSC(Osteocalcin)
outcomeMeasures.description: OSC(Osteocalcin) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in CTx(Collagen Type 1 Cross-linked C-telopeptide)
outcomeMeasures.description: CTx(collagen type 1 cross-linked C-telopeptide) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in bALP(Bone-specific Alkaline Phosphatase)
outcomeMeasures.description: bALP(bone-specific alkaline phosphatase) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in PTH(Parathyroid Hormone)
outcomeMeasures.description: PTH(parathyroid hormone) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).
